blogData.title: Reviewing Vimeo Create On Android Phone

data.richContent:
Hello!

Welcome back to another video editor review where we will be giving honest reviews about a video editor application.

This time, we are going to write a review about Vimeo Create on an Android phone.

What Is Vimeo

Vimeo is a free video editing app from the creators of Vimeo, the online video sharing platform.

The app claims that it will allow users to trim, cut, merge, reorder, add filters and spice it up with music, text and stickers.

What We Will Be Judging

In this article, we will be judging how good Vimeo Create is at:

  • Trimming and cutting video clips
  • Adding video/image overlays
  • Applying filters, effects, and masks on videos
  • Adding texts
  • Adding music/audio

We picked these 5 items as they are the basic attributes of short video editing.

First Impression of Vimeo Create

However, with our test, it does not seem that Vimeo is able to do the things mentioned above. The subscription structure is confusing and the app is hard to use.

it is sad to say that we are giving Vimeo Create a 0 out of 5 stars.
